description: This file defines an interface class 'IEventHandler' with several pure virtual methods intended for handling different types of events within the WPEFramework plugin namespace.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class declaring event handler methods for runtime, window manager, ripple, and state change events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle runtime manager related events with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle window manager related events with provided JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handle ripple events identified by name with associated JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handle state change events with provided JSON data.
